lifted by `account`."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"acceptGovernor()":{"details":"Accepts to become the next governor. Must only be called by the pending governor."},"borrow(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Borrows tokens on the given position. Position must still be safe.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of underlying tokens to borrow.","_owner":"The position owner to borrow underlying tokens.","_pid":"The position id to borrow underlying tokens."}},"create(address)":{"details":"Creates a new money market for the given underlying token. Permissionless.","params":{"_underlying":"The ERC-20 that is borrowable in the newly created market contract."}},"fetchPositionDebt(address,uint256)":{"details":"Returns the debt of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue."},"fetchPositionLTV(address,uint256)":{"details":"Returns the LTV of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue."},"getPositionTokens(address,uint256)":{"details":"Returns the position's collateral token and PFToken."},"initialize(address,address,address,address,address)":{"details":"Initializes this smart contract. No constructor to make this upgradable."},"isPermittedCaller(address,address)":{"details":"Returns whether the given sender is allowed to interact with a position of the owner."},"liquidate(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Liquidates the given position. Can be called by anyone but must be liquidatable.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of debt to be repaid by caller. Must not exceed half debt (rounded up).","_owner":"The position owner to be liquidated.","_pid":"The position id to be liquidated."}},"open(address,address,address)":{"details":"Opens a new position to borrow a specific token for a specific collateral.","params":{"_collateral":"The token that is used as collateral in this position.","_owner":"The owner of the newly created position. Sender must be allowed to act for.","_underlying":"The token that is allowed to be borrowed in this position."}},"pause()":{"details":"Pauses and stops money market-related interactions. Must only be called by the governor."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"put(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Puts more collateral to the given position. Payer must be position owner or sender.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of collateral to put via `transferFrom`.","_owner":"The position owner to put more collateral.","_pid":"The position id to put more collateral."}},"recover(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Recovers lost tokens by the governor. This function is extremely powerful so be careful.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of tokens to recover.","_pfToken":"The PFToken to propagate this recover call.","_token":"The ERC20 token to recover."}},"repay(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repays tokens on the given position. Payer must be position owner or sender.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of underlying tokens to repay.","_owner":"The position owner to repay underlying tokens.","_pid":"The position id to repay underlying tokens."}},"selflessLiquidate(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"onlyGov selfless liquidation if collateral size = 0","params":{"_amount":"The amount of debt to be repaid by caller.","_owner":"The position owner to be liquidated.","_pid":"The position id to be liquidated."}},"setAllowPublicCreate(bool)":{"details":"Sets whether anyone can create pftoken of any token. Must only be called by the governor."},"setConfig(address)":{"details":"Updates the config address. Must only be called by the governor."},"setInterestModel(address)":{"details":"Updates the interest model address. Must only be called by the governor."},"setOracle(address)":{"details":"Updates the oracle address. Must only be called by the governor."},"setOwnerWhitelists(address[],bool)":{"details":"Sets the whitelist statuses for the given owners. Must only be called by the governor."},"setPendingGovernor(address)":{"details":"Sets the next governor, which will be in effect when they accept.","params":{"_pendingGovernor":"The next governor address."}},"setRunnerWhitelists(address[],bool)":{"details":"Sets the whitelist statuses for the given runners. Must only be called by the governor."},"take(address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Takes some collateral out of the position and send it out. Position must still be safe.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of collateral to take via `transfer`.","_owner":"The position owner to take collateral out.","_pid":"The position id to take collateral out."}},"unpause()":{"details":"Unpauses and allows again money market-related interactions. Must only be called by the governor."}},"stateVariables":{"config":{"details":"Returns the address of the config contract."},"interestModel":{"details":"Returns the interest rate model smart contract."},"oracle":{"details":"Returns the address of the oracle contract."},"pfTokens":{"details":"Returns the address of BToken of the given underlying token, or 0 if not acceptGovernor().details: Accepts to become the next governor. Must only be called by the pending governor.

borrow(address,uint256,uint256).details: Borrows tokens on the given position. Position must still be safe.

params._amount: The amount of underlying tokens to borrow.
params._owner: The position owner to borrow underlying tokens.
params._pid: The position id to borrow underlying tokens.

create(address).details: Creates a new money market for the given underlying token. Permissionless.

params._underlying: The ERC-20 that is borrowable in the newly created market contract.

fetchPositionDebt(address,uint256).details: Returns the debt of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue.

fetchPositionLTV(address,uint256).details: Returns the LTV of the given position. Can't be view as it needs to call accrue.

getPositionTokens(address,uint256).details: Returns the position's collateral token and PFToken.

initialize(address,address,address,addre.details: Initializes this smart contract. No constructor to make this upgradable.

isPermittedCaller(address,address).details: Returns whether the given sender is allowed to interact with a position of the owner.

liquidate(address,uint256,uint256).details: Liquidates the given position. Can be called by anyone but must be liquidatable.

params._amount: The amount of debt to be repaid by caller. Must not exceed half debt (rounded up).
params._owner: The position owner to be liquidated.
params._pid: The position id to be liquidated.

open(address,address,address).details: Opens a new position to borrow a specific token for a specific collateral.

params._collateral: The token that is used as collateral in this position.
params._owner: The owner of the newly created position. Sender must be allowed to act for.
params._underlying: The token that is allowed to be borrowed in this position.

pause().details: Pauses and stops money market-related interactions. Must only be called by the governor.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

put(address,uint256,uint256).details: Puts more collateral to the given position. Payer must be position owner or sender.

params._amount: The amount of collateral to put via `transferFrom`.
params._owner: The position owner to put more collateral.
params._pid: The position id to put more collateral.

recover(address,address,uint256).details: Recovers lost tokens by the governor. This function is extremely powerful so be careful.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to recover.
params._pfToken: The PFToken to propagate this recover call.

repay(address,uint256,uint256).details: Repays tokens on the given position. Payer must be position owner or sender.

params._amount: The amount of underlying tokens to repay.
params._owner: The position owner to repay underlying tokens.
params._pid: The position id to repay underlying tokens.

selflessLiquidate(address,uint256,uint25.details: onlyGov selfless liquidation if collateral size = 0

params._amount: The amount of debt to be repaid by caller.
params._owner: The position owner to be liquidated.
params._pid: The position id to be liquidated.

setAllowPublicCreate(bool).details: Sets whether anyone can create pftoken of any token. Must only be called by the governor.

setConfig(address).details: Updates the config address. Must only be called by the governor.

setInterestModel(address).details: Updates the interest model address. Must only be called by the governor.

setOracle(address).details: Updates the oracle address. Must only be called by the governor.

setOwnerWhitelists(address[],bool).details: Sets the whitelist statuses for the given owners. Must only be called by the governor.

setPendingGovernor(address).details: Sets the next governor, which will be in effect when they accept.

setRunnerWhitelists(address[],bool).details: Sets the whitelist statuses for the given runners. Must only be called by the governor.

take(address,uint256,uint256).details: Takes some collateral out of the position and send it out. Position must still be safe.

params._amount: The amount of collateral to take via `transfer`.
params._owner: The position owner to take collateral out.
params._pid: The position id to take collateral out.

unpause().details: Unpauses and allows again money market-related interactions. Must only be called by the governor.
